cache_inode_status_t cache_inode_rdwr (  cache_entry_t *  pentry,

cache_inode_status_t *  pstatus
) 
 

cache_inode_rdwr: Reads/Writes through the cache layer.

Reads/Writes through the cache layer.

Parameters:
pentry [IN] entry in cache inode layer whose content is to be accessed.
read_or_write [IN] a flag of type cache_content_io_direction_t to tell if a read or write is to be done.
seek_descriptor [IN] absolute position (in the FSAL file) where the IO will be done.
buffer_size [IN] size of the buffer pointed by parameter 'buffer'.
pio_size [OUT] the size of the io that was successfully made.
pfsal_attr [OUT] the FSAL attributes after the operation.
buffer write:[IN] read:[OUT] the buffer for the data.
ht [INOUT] the hashtable used for managing the cache.
pclient [IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
pcontext [IN] fsal context for the operation. [OUT] returned status.
Returns:
CACHE_CONTENT_SUCCESS is successful .
